Assessment.QuestionText: Can you match the properties, methods, and events of the <font face="courier new">Control</font> class against their corresponding descriptions?

Options.Option: Method used to specify the next control to be navigated according to the tab order.
Property to determine for any mnemonic characters associated with the control.
Event that is invoked when the focus is received by the control.
Property to retrieve a value indicating whether the control is focused.
Method to place the focus on the control.
